subtitles.text: Before we start the show, we would like to decide the MC for today.
Please vote for your favorite number from 1 to 3.
The person with the number on the number tag will be the MC for today.
Are you ready? I already have this one.

I wonder how it will go today.
I'm Ema Sakura, the MC for today.
Thank you for watching the 53rd episode of Ebichu no Yukai de Fufuna Showroom.

Ebichu no Yukai de Fufuna Showroom is a show about our sisterly existence,
Yukka's showroom.
This is the first episode in 2023.
Thank you for the first episode.

see this stream.

The 53rd episode of the showroom is ending soon.
We have a lot of announcements.

First, the F.C. Family of the F.C. members will be held on February 12th at
Pacifico Yokohama.
Tickets are on sale, so please come and visit.

The F.C. Family of the F.C. members will be held at the F.C. Free Live & Special
Event.
The first event will be held on February 4th at Kobe Harbourland Space Theatre.
The next event will be held on February 5th at Omiya Stella Town.
The next event will be held on February 25th at Canal City Hakata.
The next event will be held at the Sun Plaza Stage on the 1st basement floor.
The next event will be held at Ion Mall on March 11th.
The next event will be held at Tokoname Wonder Forest.
The next event will be held at Kyuryo Wonder Stage.
And the last event will be held in Kanto on April 1st.

We, Cocona and Yuna, will do our best for the first F.C. Family of the F.C.
members.

The 50th anniversary event of TVK, Daikannai Devil, will be held at Kanagawa
Prefecture Hall on Tuesday, March 21st.
It will be held from 4.30pm. Please come and visit.
